title: [Chinese Language][Learning] 300 riddles
description:
[Chinese Language][Learning] 300 riddles 
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  brought to you by DaoBan

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Content:

Designed for young chinese children.

This is from a VCD that came with a book that I have (ISBN 978-780138-750-9).

The book has 300 riddles.  
-The categories include 
--animals, 
--food, and 
--general things like pencils, clocks, etc

-The book has 
--Simplified Chinese and Pinyin, 
--cartoon pictures to give a hint about the answer to the riddle
--the answers to the riddles

The VCD has 
-75 of the riddles spoken by a native speaker, 
-the Chinese characters (in a stylized font), 
-and (sort of) animated cartoons.

The book REALLY is useful to go with the vcd in this situation.  If you can, buy it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes on the files:

-an .iso of the VCD (I got lazy this time)
-one sample file in .mpg format so you can take a look at it before downloading


----------------------------------------------------------------------


Just for fun...

Here is what they say in the sample clip...

qi shi pei chang qiang
ai ba mi lai niang
zou nan you chuang bei
yi sheng cai hua mang

(tone marks not included obviously)

----------------------------------------------------------------------

And, of course...

If you like it, buy it.
